subject: p15758946
Impression: AP chest compared to, 8:25 pm: Mild pulmonary edema has improved and mediastinal vascular engorgement has decreased substantially. Heart is normal size, unchanged. Moderate left and small right pleural effusion have both improved, reflecting previous hemodynamic decompensation. Right internal jugular, left subclavian infusion port are in standard placements. Nasogastric tube ends in the stomach. No pneumothorax.
